title: 6-7am-  It’s National Common Sense Day & a Theft Ring is Busted
itunes:title: 6-7am-  It’s National Common Sense Day & a Theft Ring is Busted
description: It’s National Common Sense Day, an update on Survivor, Kourtney Kardashian says ditch the microwave, Pamela Anderson says to let your kids experiment, Gisele Bündchen uses breast milk for everything, Christina Aguilera has naked Sundays, Kristin Bell locks her kids in their room so they learn to sleep in their own bed, the World Series is this weekend, we are going to win the Powerball, Voting in this election is important, a catalytic converter theft ring was caught because of a catalytic converter necklace, the things bartenders hate, and Vinnie reads your texts!
